org.jplot2d.data

Class ImageCoordinateReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.data.ImageCoordinateReference

  • public class ImageCoordinateReference
extends java.lang.Object
    Define the relationship between the image pixels and axis values, by reference pixel, reference value and pixel size. By default, the reference pixel and reference value are 0, means the middle point of pixel 0 is on axis value 0.

    Efficient immutable! Once the image graph has been added to a plot, the properties cannot be changed any more.
